export-markdown.exportToMarkdownTooltip: Export the contents to Markdown notes
export-markdown.actorTemplate.Name: Actor: '{name}'
export-markdown.actorTemplate.Hint: Specify the handlebars template file to be used when creating Notes for '{name}' Actors
export-markdown.itemTemplate.Name: Item: '{name}'
export-markdown.itemTemplate.Hint: Specify the handlebars template file to be used when creating Notes for '{name}' Items
